summary:
Want a fast and immersive way of traveling from Riften to Iverstead or maybe the other way?
now you can!
descriptionHtml:
[u][b] Mod name: [/b][/u] Boat travel - Iverstead Riften

[u][b] Author: [/b][/u] remonH

[size=7] [u][b] Description: [/b][/u] [/size]

with this mod you can go and use a boat to travel from Riften to Iverstead. Or the other way. The boat is located near the bridge of Iverstead. The boat from Riften is already in the game just go to the Riften docks where the big fishing boat lies. If you want to travel, just go inside trough the trapdoor.

I made this mod because i love immersion and i wanted to have more ways of traveling. So this is actually a mod for people who don't like fast travel or use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/?] [color=light blue] [i] Frostfall [/i] [/color] [/url] and completely disabled it.

[size=3] [u][b] Bugs / issues: [/b][/u] [/size] [color=red]red is in progress[/color], [color=green]green is done[/color]
[list] [color=red]
[*] For some reason the Dawnguard DLC is required for the mod to let it actually work withoutproblems (this is weird because I only added a trapdoor and a boat)
[*]Sometimes the trapdoor won’t be there. If this happens you need to save the game and then reload it.
[color=green][*]The Iverstead boat is only accessible by jumping of the bridge. I will add a ladder or a dock later. [/color]
[*]The Iverstead boat doesn’t have a crew of any furnitures.
[/color] [/list]

I am working to fix all the problems so if you encounter a something or you have a suggestion please leave a comment.

[size=3] [u] [b] Future plans: [/b] [/u] [/size]
[list]
[*]Make it work without the Dawnguard DLC
[*]Make a dock or ladder to access the Iverstead boat
[*]Make the Iverstead boat look like the bloat in Riften [/list]

[size=4] [u] [b] installation: [/b] [/u] [/size]

[size=2] [u] [b]manual: [/b] [/u] [/size]
[list]
[*]download the file
[*]go to your Data folder
[*]drag the file to the Data folder
[*]make sure you activated the mod in the data files selection of the skyrim menu
[/list]

[size=2] [u] [b]NMM: [/b] [/u] [/size]
[list]
[*] click on download(NMM)
[*]activate the file in NMM
[/list]

if you really can't find out, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/38219/?tb=feed&pUp=1] Gopher[/url] made a beautiful video about the Nexus Mod Manager [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N_4RotEtks0&list=PL96C073B0B8BFC01D&index=2] Click here for the video [/url]

also download the update. it is installed just the same way as the main file, the only change is that with NMM if a window pops up you need to say that you don't want to update it.

Before i forget... check out my other mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48682/?] Craftable Giant club ---- V 1 [/url]
(don't be to hard on that one, it was my first mod [u]EVER[/u])

[size=50] Sorry for my terrible englisch XD [/size]

[size=3][color=green][b] If you like the mod or the idea please endorse! [/b][/color][/size]
author: remonH
